title: MakerSpace-Based Scientific Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhanced science inquiry activities linked to social studies, with maker projects conducted in a non-real-time online environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute scientific problem-solving processes using makerspace tools
Through collaborative learning, learners can simulate scientific phenomena by applying creative modeling techniques
Learners can systematically record and analyze project processes/outcomes in digital portfolios to produce reflective reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
